overview: As Founder and Principal at Creative Media Alliance, Gary brings nearly two decades of communications and technology experience to bear on marketing and communications initiatives for a wide variety of clients, including Bank of America, Lexus, Microsoft, W Hotel, Turner, Callison, Vulcan, and the Four Seasons. These initiatives cover the spectrum of agency services from branding to print to web to video. Prior to this role, Gary held IT management positions at Immunex Corporation and Delrina Corporation, with responsibilities for communications and technology.
